body.name: Pamo Babe Portable Playard,Sturdy Play Yard with Mattress and Toy bar with Soft Toys (Grey)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 51 mins
features: 【Folding & Detachable Design】– The bassinet bed can be easily removed from the baby playard. The baby travel playard is compact and doesn't take up much space. A carry bag is convenient for storage and transport,the travel cot fits in the trunk of a car and is perfect for travel.If you have limited living space, you are definitely going to fall in love with this amazing playard.

【Breathable & Visual Mesh】– The breathable mesh fabric ensures visibility, healthy air flow and guarantees a peaceful slumber for your baby.The portable travel playard is suitable for birth to 33 LBS of kids.

【Easy & Fast Assembly】– For utmost convenience, the baby travel cot does not require extensive setup and can be stored away or reassembled in mere minutes. Just snap the bassinet’s frame in place and the crib is ready for use. Easily collapsible as well, it takes just seconds to pack away or reassemble, without any stress or complicated steps.

【Stable Construction & Safe Details】– 7-point supporting structure on the bottom comes with more steadiness. Smooth rounded corners to prevent children from being hurt by collisions.Two moving wheels make it easy to change usage scenarios.
【Care & Clean】– Use only household mild soap and warm water to wipe. Do not use bleach; Do not machine wash.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Two Styles There are two styles of cute bunny and dinosaur on the fabric. Learn More How to fold? Firstly pull up the drawstring of the bottom,secondly pull down the four sides of the playpen. Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pack ‘n’ play and had it shipped directly to my parents house for when we come to visit. it is the perfect size and compact very nicely where it does not take up a lot of space when it is stored. It is extremely easy to assemble. I like this pack ‘n’ play because it is sturdy like the one we have at home, however, at a much better price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pack and play
reviews.reviewText: The pack and play was super easy to assemble and looks very cute. It seems sturdy and comfortable. The infant net insert is also great. The price was reasonable as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent play pen for parents on the go or traveling around
reviews.reviewText: This one more of less comes ready to use out of the box. The mattress/pad inside is quite sturdy and the little mobile directions occupy my LO's attention span for at least ten minutes. This is quite excellent for his tummy time and what we have mainly used it for. It folds up very nicely and is super easy for traveling. If you do use this, please watch the latches when assembling the play pen as they will pinch your hands (of course most any baby installation such as a car seat can also pinch and cut the hands!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for our new grandsons visit!
reviews.reviewText: I like this was perfect as a bassinet for our new baby grandson coming to visit us and will grow with him for a few years. Both to use as a playpen and bed. It was sturdy. It was easy to set up once we knew how yet the hardest part was the zipper when getting it started was a bit challenging on the bassinet & my only real issue, still it felt sturdy once done though. Was easy to disassemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just wanna say that the delivery is fast. I’m happy that the package delivered earlier for my niece. The package is easy to use and have a great design. We love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are cute, easy to use baby beds. They are easy to wipe down. They're easy to open and take down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a play pan with a bassinet for my baby, he's 5 months and I wanted to still keep him in my room, but our bassinet was running too small for him. I was looking into affordable pack n plays and this one does the job. If you move it you do have to make it study again, but to me it's no problem, the mattress really is very hard, definitely recommend buying a mattress topper, but so far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As a brand new grandmother, I spent DAYS going over the various options for a portable crib/pac and play before deciding on this Pamo. As the baby lives close by, I wanted it to be comfortable, sturdy and safe for frequent, but not daily, use. It also didn't hurt that it was discounted on prime day deals! I read previous reviews, and one issue I was concerned about was the difficulty of assembly that was mentioned. I put it together myself in about 20 minutes at a very casual speed. True that the instructions could be a clearer. The raised level for newborns actually zips in to place and that took me a few minutes to locate where to start the zipper connection. Wish the wheels rolled - I ended up dragging the bed across the floor. Will examine again - could be installer failure! I think this was a good choice for my purpose - adequate features without a lot of extra features that would have been nice for a short while but then would need to be stored away somewhere!
